channel.title: JDK Tutorial in Batch Format for Server/Client
channel.description:
[center][b]Da 0wnz's Batched JDK Tutorial[/b]
[b]INTRODUCTION:[/b] I was really bored one day and decided to make this to add for servers and clients! It is very unique and I haven't seen one posted on mopar forums yet!
[b]PURPOSE:[/b] For people that have downloaded your client and do not have jdk, they can look at this tutorial and install JDK using it.
[b]PICTURES:[/b] [IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/vmwuie.png[/img]
[b]PLEASE TELL ME IF THIS IS NOT ALLOWED TO BE POSTED! THE RULES DON'T STATE THIS.[/b]
[b]CREDITS:[/b] Da 0wnz (me) - 100%
[b]FEEL FREE TO LEECH BUT PLEASE GIVE ME CREDIT[/b]
[b]DOWNLOAD LINK:[/b] *
[b]VIRUS SCAN:[/b] [IMG]http://i27.tinypic.com/egsle9.png[/img][/center]
